description: Annual submission of audited financial statements to the State Department for Energy and National Treasury within 6 months of financial year-end (30 June), per the State Corporations Act Cap 446.
notes: FY2023 audited financial statements submitted and approved. FY2024 audit in progress.

description: Quarterly submission of reliability statistics (SAIDI, SAIFI, CAIDI) and quality of supply reports to EPRA within 30 days of quarter end, per EPRA Distribution Code 2023.
notes: Q1 FY2025 reliability report submitted on 28 October 2024. SAIDI 9.8 hours for Q1.

description: Annual renewal of KPLC electricity distribution licence from EPRA covering nationwide distribution mandate. Licence valid from 1 July 2023 to 30 June 2026.
notes: 3-year distribution licence renewed on 1 July 2023. Next renewal due June 2026.

description: Annual environmental compliance audit and report to NEMA covering KPLC's substation operations, PCB transformers disposal programme, and transmission line right-of-way management, per Environmental Management and Coordination Act (EMCA) 1999.
notes: 2024 environmental audit scheduled for November 2024. 2023 report submitted with minor non-conformances on PCB disposal timeline.

description: Annual SCAC performance contract evaluation and submission of returns for FY2023/24, including board effectiveness self-assessment using Mwongozo framework and performance contract score verification.
notes: Submission delayed by 2 weeks due to board composition change. Late submission penalty of KES 50,000 incurred. Submission made 15 October 2024.

description: OSHA Annual Safety Audit and submission of workplace safety statistics to Directorate of Occupational Safety and Health Services (DOSHS) within 30 days of year-end, per Occupational Safety and Health Act 2007.
regulatoryBody: Directorate of Occupational Safety and Health Services (DOSHS)
notes: FY2024 safety statistics submitted. 3 LTIs and 1 fatality reported. DOSHS investigation into Machakos fatality ongoing.

description: Corporate Income Tax (CIT) return filing and payment for FY2024 by 31 December 2024. Estimated tax payable based on preliminary results of KES 840m.
notes: Instalment tax paid in June 2024 (KES 420m). Final balance to be settled December 2024.

description: Quarterly AGPO (Access to Government Procurement Opportunities) reporting to National Treasury on participation of youth, women, and PWD enterprises in KPLC procurement.
notes: Q1 FY2025 AGPO report submitted. KPLC achieved 38% local content and 18% AGPO participation — below 20% target. Improvement plan submitted.

description: Annual renewal of Air Operating Certificate (AOC) from KCAA covering all scheduled and charter operations. AOC renewal involves full operational and safety audit by KCAA inspectors.
notes: AOC renewed April 2024 for 2-year period. All 8 prior audit findings closed. Next renewal March 2026.

description: Annual financial statements filing with Nairobi Securities Exchange (NSE) and Capital Markets Authority (CMA) within 4 months of financial year-end (31 December), per CMA regulations.
notes: FY2023 results announced and filed on 30 April 2024. Going concern emphasis included per EY recommendation.

description: KCAA Safety Management System audit compliance — all SMS manual requirements to be implemented and auditable within 90 days of KCAA audit finding issuance.
notes: All 8 KCAA SMS audit findings closed by 10 April 2024. Closure certificate issued 20 April 2024. FRC system upgraded.

description: CORSIA MRV (Monitoring, Reporting and Verification) of CO2 emissions from all international routes under ICAO CORSIA Phase 1, effective 1 January 2024.
documentReference: ICAO CORSIA SARP Annex 16 Vol IV
notes: MRV system deployed January 2024. 2024 emissions data being collected. First annual report due March 2025.

description: Mwongozo Code annual board effectiveness self-assessment and submission to State Department for Transport by 28 February each year.
notes: 2024 Mwongozo assessment score: 72% (Satisfactory). Submitted on 28 February 2024 — on time. Previous year was 15 days late.

description: Corporate Income Tax return and payment for year ended 31 December 2023. KQ has accumulated losses and tax loss carry-forward credits, resulting in nil CIT liability for 2023.
notes: 2023 CIT return filed showing accumulated tax losses of KES 18.5bn. Nil tax payable. KRA assessment pending.

description: Kenya Airways compliance with Kenya Civil Aviation (Consumer Protection) Regulations 2019 covering passenger rights, refunds, denied boarding compensation, and baggage liability.
notes: KCAA found KQ non-compliant in June 2024 — 245 passenger refund cases unresolved beyond the 7-day regulatory deadline. Fine of KES 2.5m imposed. Refund backlog being cleared.

description: Annual submission of audited financial statements to the State Department for Transport and National Treasury within 6 months of financial year-end (30 June), per the State Corporations Act Cap 446.
notes: FY2023 audited financial statements submitted with clean PwC audit opinion. FY2024 audit scheduled to commence July 2024.

description: Annual Performance Contract signing with Cabinet Secretary for Transport, covering operational, financial, and development targets for the fiscal year.
notes: FY2024/25 Performance Contract signed 1 July 2024. Targets: 1.5m TEU throughput, KES 42bn revenue. Signed ahead of August deadline.

description: MARPOL (International Convention for Prevention of Pollution from Ships) compliance for KPA port operations including oil spill response capability, waste reception facilities, and annual MARPOL compliance report to Kenya Maritime Authority.
documentReference: MARPOL 73/78 and Kenya Merchant Shipping Act 2009
notes: MV Atlantic Star oil spill (12 tonnes, July 2024) investigation ongoing. KPA oil spill response assessed as adequate — activated within 45 minutes. NEMA post-spill monitoring continues.

description: Annual ISPS Code (International Ship and Port Facility Security Code) compliance verification and submission of Port Facility Security Plan updates to Kenya Maritime Authority and IMO.
notes: 2024 ISPS compliance verification completed. Port Facility Security Plan updated incorporating new biometric access control system installed December 2023.

description: ISO 9001:2015 Quality Management System certification maintenance for Kilindini Harbour, Mombasa ICD, and Port Reitz operations. Annual surveillance audit by Bureau Veritas required.
notes: ISO 9001:2015 recertification by Bureau Veritas completed May 2023. Certificate valid to May 2026. Pursuing ISO 14001 environmental certification by June 2025.

description: Corporate Income Tax return for FY2024 (year ended 30 June 2024) by 31 December 2024. Estimated CIT payable on KES 8.7bn net profit approximately KES 2.6bn.
notes: Instalment tax payments made: December 2023 KES 1.1bn, March 2024 KES 1.1bn. Balance of KES 420m due December 2024. KRA FY2021-2023 assessment of KES 420m under appeal.

description: Mwongozo Code annual board effectiveness self-assessment and submission to State Department for Transport by 28 February each year.
notes: 2024 Mwongozo assessment score: 87% — highest among Kenya Tier 1 SOEs. Submitted on 25 February 2024, ahead of deadline.

description: Continuous disclosure obligations to NSE and CMA including quarterly results announcements, material information disclosures, and director dealings notifications.
notes: Q1 FY2025 results announced 15 November 2024. All director dealings reported within 3 days. No material information violations in FY2024.

description: Collective Bargaining Agreement compliance for KAWU and KALPA covering pay, conditions, and grievance procedures. Annual CBA return to Ministry of Labour required.
regulatoryBody: Ministry of Labour and Social Protection
notes: KAWU CBA 2023-2025 and KALPA CBA 2022-2024 both in compliance. Annual CBA returns filed June 2024. KALPA CBA renewal due January 2025.

description: Minimum dividend remittance to National Treasury of 50% of audited net profit within 3 months of year-end approval, per National Treasury Dividend Policy for Tier 1 SOEs (GD-ALL-2023-003).
notes: FY2023 final dividend of KES 4.1bn (50% of KES 8.2bn net profit) transferred to National Treasury on 28 June 2024 — within 3-month deadline. FY2023 interim dividend of KES 2.05bn paid December 2023.
